description:
Jamie Glazier's The Art of Focus course is all about helping you understand what Focus really is. Whether your'e an athlete, student, artist or business person, we all know how much our ability to focus can impact our level of performance.

In this course, Jamie will provide you with tried and tested exercises and strategies he has used with his World Class athlete's. Jamie's approach to mental performance is fun and practical, helping to engage you in developing your mind's performance.

This course has 22 lectures and 2hrs of video content with practical tools and solutions for you to implement into your daily rituals to ensure you're strengthening your minds performance EVERYDAY!
title: The Art of Effective Focus!
